text: The 1971 GP Ouest-France was the 35th edition of the GP Ouest-France cycle race and was held on 24 August 1971. The race started and finished in Plouay. The race was won by Jean-Pierre Danguillaume. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 38" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 32" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 32" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 32" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 32" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 35" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 35" |} |} ==References== 1971 Category:1971 in road cycling Category:1971 in French sport
